org.pikater.core.utilities.evolution

Class RandomNumberGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.core.utilities.evolution.RandomNumberGenerator

  • public class RandomNumberGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for the java.util.Random. Provides a singleton random number generator.
    Author:
    Martin Pilat

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RandomNumberGenerator getInstance()
      Returns the only instance of random number generator.
      java.util.Random getRandom() 
      double nextDouble() 
      double nextGaussian()
      Returns the next pseudorandom, Gaussian ("normally") distributed double value with mean 0.0 and standard deviation 1.0 from this random number generator's sequence.
      int nextInt(int n)
      Returns a random integer between 0 and n - 1 (inclusive).
      void reseed(long seed)
      Sets a new seed for the random number generator.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RandomNumberGenerator getInstance()
        Returns the only instance of random number generator.
        Returns:
        The random number generator.

      • nextInt

        public int nextInt(int n)
        Returns a random integer between 0 and n - 1 (inclusive).
        Parameters:
        n - The upper limit
        Returns:
        Random integer between 0 and n - 1 drawn from a uniform distribution.

      • nextDouble

        public double nextDouble()
        Returns:
        A random double from the interval [0, 1) drawn from a uniform distribution.

      • nextGaussian

        public double nextGaussian()
        Returns the next pseudorandom, Gaussian ("normally") distributed double value with mean 0.0 and standard deviation 1.0 from this random number generator's sequence.
        Returns:
        The number from Gaussian distribution

      • reseed

        public void reseed(long seed)
        Sets a new seed for the random number generator.
        Parameters:
        seed - The seed which shall be set.
